item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a software engineer living in the Greater Toronto Area, Canada. I graduated with distinction from University of Toronto, Computer Science program. My favourite programming language is Python while I admire the beauty of Clojure and Scala. I also write Go, some Ruby and JavaScript (of course). I love docker, rabbitmq and ansible I use console vim with tmux for almost all of my coding; Arch Linux at home and Ubuntu at work.
